00024 #ifndef _MSDATAFILE_HPP_
00025 #define _MSDATAFILE_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "MSData.hpp"
00029 #include "BinaryDataEncoder.hpp"
00030 
00031 #if (!defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(PWIZ_NO_READER_RAW))
00032 // Xcalibur DLL usage is msvc only - mingw doesn't provide com support
00033 #define PWIZ_NO_READER_RAW
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 namespace pwiz {
00037 namespace msdata {
00038 
00039 
00040 /// MSData object plus file I/O
00041 struct MSDataFile : public MSData
00042 {
00043     /// interface for file readers
00044     class Reader
00045     {
00046         public:
00047 
00048         /// return true iff Reader can handle the file; Reader may filter based on
00049         /// filename or on the buffer holding the head of the file
00050         virtual bool accept(const std::string& filename, const std::string& head) const = 0;
00051 
00052         /// fill in the MSData structure -- generally this will amount to: 
00053         /// 1) fill in the file-level metadata
00054         /// 2) instantiate a SpectrumList (held by MSData::run.spectrumListPtr)
00055         virtual void read(const std::string& filename, MSData& result) const = 0;
00056 
00057         virtual ~Reader(){}
00058     };
00059 
00060     /// runtime Reader registration (replaces default Readers)
00061     static void registerReader(const Reader& reader);
00062 
00063     /// clear registered Reader (use default Readers)
00064     static void clearReader();
00065 
00066     /// constructs MSData object backed by file
00067     MSDataFile(const std::string& filename);
00068 
00069     /// data format for write()
00070     enum Format {Format_Text, Format_mzML, Format_mzXML};
00071 
00072     /// configuration for write()
00073     struct WriteConfig
00074     {
00075         Format format;
00076         BinaryDataEncoder::Config binaryDataEncoderConfig;
00077         bool indexed;
00078 
00079         WriteConfig(Format _format = Format_mzML)
00080         :   format(_format), indexed(true)
00081         {}
00082     };
00083 
00084     /// static write function for any MSData object
00085     static void write(const MSData& msd,
00086                       const std::string& filename,
00087                       const WriteConfig& config = WriteConfig());
00088 
00089     /// member write function 
00090     void write(const std::string& filename,
00091                const WriteConfig& config = WriteConfig());
00092 };
00093 
00094 
00095 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, MSDataFile::Format format);
00096 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const MSDataFile::WriteConfig& config);
00097 
00098 
00099 } // namespace msdata
00100 } // namespace pwiz
00101 
00102 
00103 #endif // _MSDATAFILE_HPP_
